descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Duncan Robinson gathers the rock and drills the 3-pointer to extend the Heat's lead.
videos.headline: Duncan Robinson pulls up and knocks down the 3

videos.description: P.J. Tucker hauls in the dime from Jimmy Butler and throws down the hammer for the Heat.
videos.headline: Jimmy Butler with the smooth dish to P.J. Tucker for the jam

videos.description: Dewayne Dedmon elevates and denies the Bulls at the rim for a big-time block.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dewayne Dedmon with the massive swat at the rim) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dewayne Dedmon with the massive swat at the rim

videos.description: Bam Adebayo skies for a massive rejection at the rim.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam Adebayo denies Chicago Bulls with block) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam has the crowd on its feet with this big block

videos.description: Gabe Vincent pump-fakes and sends DeMar DeRozan flying as he knocks down the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Gabe Vincent gets the basket plus the foul) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Gabe Vincent fakes out DeMar DeRozan and drains the smooth and-1

videos.description: Jimmy Butler soars through the paint and somehow gets the and-1 to fall to extend the Heat's lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler gets the hoop and the harm) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler somehow drains this acrobatic and-1

videos.description: Tyler Herro drives past multiple Bulls defenders and drains the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyler Herro fights off defender for and-1) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tyler Herro won't be denied as he knocks down the and-1
